overview: You’ve seen TED Talks. But now experience the TED conference—the flagship event where big ideas are born that transform the world. TED2017 will feature a lineup of speakers like never before. Join fellow TED fans and be among the first to watch these brilliant speakers give the “talk of their lives” and share extraordinary insight that will shape our future for years to come. Through the TED Cinema Experience series, we all have access to the world-famous TED experience, giving us the opportunity to have our curiosity sparked, minds opened, and worlds shifted -- together through three community viewing events on cinema screens.
title: TED Cinema Experince
